lead_paragraph: Luc Bourdon, the Canucks defenseman who died Thursday, received his motorcycle license two weeks before he was killed when his bike veered into a truck on a winding, two-lane road near his hometown, Shippagan, New Brunswick. Investigators said Friday that the 21-year-old Bourdon’s inexperience on a motorcycle might have played a role in his death.
